name: English Rose Floral Water
description:
This pure floral water is produced from the steam distillation of hand picked, fresh rose petals. 

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 

The wonderful, fragrant scent of Rose makes it a lovely addition to any skincare routine. It's rich, healing properties though make it particularly suited to dry, sensitive and mature skin, in helping stimulate cell renewal, even tone and texture, as well as calm irritation and rosacea.

To use dab a little onto cotton wool and apply after cleansing to soothe and tone skin.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

---> Be sure to store this product in a cool, dark place and use within 3 months of opening as stated on the bottle

name: Tea Tree Floral Water
description:
This pure floral water is produced from the steam distillation of the tea tree plant.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

The natural antibacterial and healing properties of tea tree means it's great for tackling oily or problem skin. 

Use as a toner by dabbing a little onto cotton wool and apply after cleansing to refresh, soothe and tone skin.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

---> Be sure to store this product in a cool, dry place and use within 3 months of opening as stated on the bottle.

name: Chamomile Floral Water
description:
This pure flower water is produced from the steam distillation of the fresh English Chamomile herb.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

It's relaxing properties and calming scent make it wonderful for all skin types, but perfect for soothing irritated or sensitive skin. 

Use as facial toner after cleansing by simply dabbing a little onto cotton wool and apply. Even add this gentle water to a bath, use as a pillow mist or as a room spray for a relaxed atmosphere.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

---> Be sure to store this product in a cool, dry place and use within 3 months of opening as stated on the bottle.

name: Orange Floral Water
description:
This pure floral water is produced from the steam distillation of fresh orange peel.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

Ideal for all skin types, it's stimulating and yummy citrus scent helps to revive tired complexions. It's excellent properties work to brighten skin, making it ideal to use as a skin toner after cleansing by dabbing a little onto cotton wool and applying, or even all over after a shower to benefit from its moisturising effects and lingering but subtle scent.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

---> Be sure to store this product in a cool, dark place and use within 3 months of opening as stated on the bottle

name: Lavender Floral Water
description:
This pure floral water is produced from the steam distillation of lavender flowers.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

Known for it's wonderful scent, lavender is calming and soothing, making it an excellent tonic for the skin. It's anti-bacterial properties help blemishes and uneven skin tone, whilst it's moisturising benefits replenish the skin. 

To use dab a little onto cotton wool and apply. Because of it's relaxing properties, lavender is particularly effective when used at night-time, even as a spray or pillow mist.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  

---> Be sure to store this product in a cool, dark place and use within 3 months of opening as stated on the bottle.
